RECOMMENDATION 9: Counselling 
All women should be given information about the physiological 
process of recovery after birth and told that some health 
problems are common, with advice to report any health 
concerns to a health care professional, in particular, signs and 
symptoms of postpartum haemorrhage, pre-eclampsia/eclampsia, 
infection and thromboembolism. (NEW in 2013)
